dct_title_s: Military map showing the marches of the United States forces under command of Maj. Genl. W.T. Sherman, U.S.A. during the years 1863, 1864, 1865
dct_alternative_sm: Military map showing the marches of the United States forces under command of Maj. Genl. W.T. Sherman, U.S.A. during the years 1863, 1864, 1865 / comp. by order of Maj. Genl. W.T. Sherman...under the direction of Bvt. Maj. W.L.B. Jenney...Drawn by Capt. William Kossak...and John B. Muller...
dct_description_sm: "Engraved at Head qrs. Corps of engineers, U.S.A., by H.C. Evans & F. Courtenay."
